author: Ana Ionova
title: Brazil's overcrowded favelas ripe for spread of coronavirus
description: Organisations, celebrities and activists scramble to give information on how favela residents can protect themselves.
content: Rio de Janeiro, Brazil - A red pick-up truck slowly rolled down a street in Complexo do Alemao, a voice blasting from its speaker. The sight is a common one in this sprawling cluster of favelas in Rio de Janeiro's north zone, with the voice on speaker announc… [+6460 chars]
